name: ModContainerHelper
description: The ModContainerHelper class is a helper class in JSMacros that provides access to mod information and metadata. It represents a loaded mod and exposes various methods for retrieving details about the mod such as its ID, name, version, authors, and dependencies.
overview:
The `ModContainerHelper` class is a helper class in JSMacros that provides access to mod information and metadata. It represents a loaded mod and exposes various methods for retrieving details about the mod such as its ID, name, version, authors, and dependencies.

This class is typically accessed when working with mods through the `Client.getMod()` method or when iterating through the list of loaded mods returned by `Client.getLoadedMods()`.

## Accessing ModContainerHelper

You typically get `ModContainerHelper` instances from:

- `Client.getLoadedMods()` - Returns a list of all loaded mods
- `Client.getMod(modId)` - Returns a specific mod by its ID

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier (ID) of the mod.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the human-readable name of the mod.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Returns the version string of the mod.

methods.name: getEnv
methods.description: Returns the environment where the mod is intended to run (e.g., 'CLIENT', 'SERVER', 'BOTH', 'UNKNOWN').

methods.name: getAuthors
methods.description: Returns a list of authors for the mod.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns a detailed description of the mod.

methods.name: getDependencies
methods.description: Returns a list of mod IDs that this mod depends on.
